text: "Queen of My Heart" is a 1983 song by American country singer Hank Williams Jr. and is the leading single from his 36th studio album Man of Steel. It went to number 6 on the Canadian country charts and number 5 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts. ==Notes== Category:1983 songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs
title: Queen of My Heart (Hank Williams Jr. song)
